Synopsis: Retrieves SMB shares information from specified computers.
Description: The Get-ComputerSMBShare function retrieves SMB share information from the specified computers. It can return basic share details or detailed information based on the 'Translated' switch.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-ComputerSMBShare -ComputerName "Server01" -Translated
Retrieves detailed translated information about SMB shares from Server01.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Get-ComputerSMBShare -ComputerName "Server01", "Server02"
Retrieves basic SMB share information from Server01 and Server02.
